description: Stylesheet containing CSS variables for theme management and various styles for the App component in a tic-tac-toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styles, including background color, text color, and layout settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, setting its background, layout, and typography.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for thematic text links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, appearance, and hover effects.
